ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: HAHA! I have to laugh because it seems you should probably be following your own advice. If you get laid so much, why do you have the time to read this trash
ygData.messageBody:
HAHA!

I have to laugh because it seems you should probably
be following your own advice.

If you get laid so much, why do you have the time to
read this trash and even more time to respond to it?

personally I could care less what you write, but I
found it funny.
